name: Bosco
aboutMe: Hello! I am Bosco, an aspiring, self-motivated software developer who has a strong interest in building scalable software that has positive impact on society and the environment.

name: Sarah
aboutMe: Hello! I'm Sarah! I'm a former veteran teacher, a career changer, and a Latina in tech. I have a passion for front end development, UI/UX design, and accessibility.
